title: How do I watch replays on mac (RIOT PLEASE LOOK)
body: I really want to replay this game I just had. I just wasted 40 minutes studying on how to get replays. You can't download it from the client so I don't understand. Anytime I try to download a replay it says an error happened. Someone please help me.

replies.body: Are you trying to watch the replays through the client or open them outside of the client? Replays need to be opened through the client by going to profile,  match history, and then clicking the button to the right of the match. Inside the replay, you can create highlights that you can freely open and share with others.
